thread.title: Alley Board
thread.title_full: Enlightium Academy reviewed by Alley Board

author: Alley Board
title: Alley Board
text: I chose this school to give my child a chance to succeed. I can't believe how amazing it has been and how well my child has excelled. His attitude for school has changed greatly and he is excited to do his work daily. Thank you Enlightium Academy for giving my child the hope he needed.
